Derek James wrote:

>I thought I'd give a brief update of the stuff Philip and I are
>working on these days, in case anyone's interested.  I've alluded to
>it in a couple of messages already.
>  
>
Thanks for the update. I think it would be interesting (and revealing) 
to be able to see how the roving eye moves around the image during a 
recognition. Apart from being cool to look at (would make a nice 
demonstration) it might give some indication of the strategy the eye is 
using to distinguish between characters.

The long search durations are a bit of a concern going forward, but not 
unexpected given the complexity of the tasks. What sort of hardware was 
the search running on BTW?

Colin
